events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday afternoon. My vehicle collided with another car at the intersection. I am filing a claim for the damages caused.
The case has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the details provided about the collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to the auto accident claim to assist the customer throughout the process and handle all necessary communications.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim related to the vehicle collision and are committed to resolving this matter as quickly as possible.
Please submit the accident report, photos of the damaged car, and any police documentation to assist with further investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents, including the police report and photos of the accident scene and damaged vehicle.
Investigation into the claim has begun to verify the cause of the collision and assess the damage extent on the insured car.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed, and all findings regarding fault and damage assessments are documented.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and associated costs resulting from the car accident.
The insured customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the timely handling of the claim.
The claim has been formally approved, authorizing payment for the damages sustained in the vehicle collision.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover repair expenses.
The claim file has been closed following successful settlement and payment for the auto accident damages.
